title: Low FPS on Windows 10
body: So yesterday i updated my Windows. I installed League and do a repair and i tried one custom and load to 80 % i heard that starting sound, but i didn't join. I wait more and i joined at 0:40 with 07 fps. After a couple seconds its was 60 fps with a lot of lags too. Before i updated Windows i was with Windows 7 and i didnt have any problems. I tried a lot of things to make it work and..meh

replies.body:
Hey man,

Just had a problem with this update (W10 Anniversary Update).
It looks like Windows are trying to force their users to get into their Xbox shit.
I don't know if I had the same exact same problem but it was a fps problem too: went from 130+ to 60. Not that I saw a difference, but I just hate when windows changes my configs.

What I did:
1/ Search for 'xbox' in ur windows-start bar. A xbox app green icon should be shown. Launch it.
2/ Log in with your windows infos, create an account if you don't have one.
3/ Once you're in it, open the "hamburger" menu on the left.
4/ Settings
5/ Clic on the "DVR Games" tab
6/ Turn the recording thing OFF.

It helped me, hope it will help you too.

People on cs, wow, dark souls and all got the problem.

PS: try to do a quick search before posting a request : http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/search?query=windows+10&application_id=PEr1qIcT&created_from=now-1d&content_type=discussion
oh i tried this before and now i tried other things and still didn't work :< fps its like 100 and randomly goes down

Since disabling the Game Bar didn't resolve your issue, I suspect there may be issues with your display drivers or windows power settings. I strongly suggest working through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a next step.

Let me know if those solutions worked for you.
